verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Ha, ha, \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w laid|strong="H8074"\w* \w waste|strong="H8074"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w led|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* captivity:

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w for|strong="H3651"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* inheritance, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* sheepcotes \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w tents|strong="H4908"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thee: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* thy \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* Rabbath \w a|strong="H3588"\w* stable \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* couching \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w clapped|strong="H4222"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w stamped|strong="H7554"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* hast \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w*: \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* spoil \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* thee \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* thee \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* break thee \w in|strong="H5921"\w* pieces: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*:

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w from|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w from|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3651"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* say, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3651"\w* borders, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* noble \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Bethiesimoth, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Beelmeon, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Cariathaim,

\w To|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* inheritance: \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w there|strong="H6924"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* execute \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H5358"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w revenge|strong="H5358"\w* herself \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* children \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* hath greatly offended, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* hath sought \w revenge|strong="H5358"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*:

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* desolate \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* south: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w* \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H0639"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w according|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H0639"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w have|strong="H6430"\w* \w taken|strong="H5358"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w*, \w and|strong="H6430"\w* \w have|strong="H6430"\w* revenged \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H5769"\w* \w their|strong="H0559"\w* \w mind|strong="H5315"\w*, destroying \w and|strong="H6430"\w* satisfying \w old|strong="H5769"\w* enmities:

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* forth \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w kill|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* killers, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w coast|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w execute|strong="H5414"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* upon \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, rebuking \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* upon \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.
